sentences.sContent: Thatreally sped up the development of penicillin as an antibiotic.
sentences.sContent_eng: Thatreally sped up the development of penicillin as an antibiotic.
sentences.sCn: 这确实加快了青霉素作为抗生素的发展。

sentences.sContent: The efficiency of testing at the tanker level is why regulations require such testing for antibiotic residues.
sentences.sContent_eng: The efficiency of testing at the tanker level is why regulations require such testing for antibiotic residues.
sentences.sCn: 在罐水平检测的效率是为什么条例要求这类抗生素残留检测的原因。

phrases.pCn: 抗生素抗性；抗菌素耐药性

remMethod.val: anti(反) + bio(生命) + tic → 抗生素

trans.tranOther: a drug that is used to kill  bacteria  and cure infections
